name: e-con Systems
overview:
e-con Systems is an embedded product development services company focused on end-end product development with an expertise in mobile processors such has PXA300, PXA320, i.MX, OMAP35x, AM/DM37x etc. Using its product engineering resources e-con helps customers develop products such as digital picture frames, Industrial data loggers, handheld platforms like Digital signage, Industrial Controllers, Low-Vision camera, IP camera, HD Camera solutions, Point of Sale terminals etc.Besides this, e-con provides System Integration Services such as Windows Embedded CE or Android or Linux BSP porting solutions and device driver development.

About e-con’s Camera Expertise e-con Systems specializes in camera solutions for different embedded platforms like PXA320, Gumstix Overo COMs, OMAP35x, AM/DM37x etc. and have Windows CE 6.0/Android drivers readily available for different camera modules (Fixed focus/Auto focus 2MP, 3MP, 5MP) with CMOS camera sensors such as OV3640, OV5642 and OV10630 etc. In past Customers have licensed our drivers and have been using it in applications such as 1D/2D bar code capture, low-vision, facial recognition, pupil diameter detection, still image and video capture.

  1. e-con is value added reseller for camera modules and the camera modules pass the IMA Tests. This brings in value addition to customers since they can achieve WYSWYG (what you see is what you get).
  2. e-con has dedicated team of more than 25 Engineers working on camera products and camera services, e-con also tweaks the camera modules for making it suitable to applications.
